name: adesso_cms_theme
description: adesso CMS Theme - Modern Drupal theme with Vite, Tailwind CSS v4, and Drupal Storybook integration

scripts.build-verify: npm run build-lib && npm run validate-build
scripts.lint: npm run lint-prettier && npm run lint-css && npm run lint-js
scripts.test:storybook:ci: concurrently -k -s first "npm run dev-storybook -- --ci" "wait-on http://localhost:6006 && npm run test:storybook"
scripts.test:storybook:a11y:ci: concurrently -k -s first "npm run dev-storybook -- --ci" "wait-on http://localhost:6006 && npm run test:storybook:a11y"
scripts.performance:core-vitals:all-municipaliti: npm run performance:core-vitals:thalwil && npm run performance:core-vitals:thalheim && npm run performance:core-vitals:erlenbach
scripts.performance:optimize: npm run bundle:optimize && npm run performance:budget:check
scripts.performance:swiss-compliance: npm run performance:lighthouse && npm run performance:budget:check
scripts.qa:full: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run test:a11y && npm run test:e2e:all-browsers && npm run test:storybook:a11y && npm run performance:swiss-compliance
scripts.qa:quick: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run test:e2e:cross-browser
scripts.qa:ci: npm run qa:full && npm run test:storybook:a11y:ci && npm run performance:municipalities:compare && npm run test:e2e:swiss-compliance
scripts.qa:storybook: npm run lint && npm run test:storybook:a11y
scripts.qa:cross-browser: npm run test:e2e:cross-browser && npm run test:e2e:visual && npm run test:e2e:accessibility
scripts.security:audit: npm audit --audit-level moderate && npm run security:snyk
scripts.security:municipal: npm run security:audit && npm run security:csp && npm run security:xss
scripts.security:full: npm run security:dependencies && npm run security:snyk && npm run security:eslint && npm run security:zap && npm run security:csp && npm run security:xss
scripts.security:swiss-compliance: npm run security:full && npm run test:e2e:swiss-compliance
scripts.optimization:full: npm run bundle:optimize && npm run assets:optimize && npm run performance:optimize && npm run security:swiss-compliance
scripts.optimization:report: npm run bundle:report && npm run assets:report && npm run performance:municipalities:compare
scripts.qa:swiss-compliance: npm run test:e2e:swiss-compliance && npm run test:e2e:accessibility && npm run test:a11y && npm run performance:swiss-compliance && npm run security:swiss-compliance && npm run bundle:size-check
scripts.qa:municipalities: npm run test:e2e:municipalities && npm run visual:cross-browser && npm run performance:municipalities:compare
scripts.qa:phase-3-2: npm run qa:full && npm run performance:municipalities:compare && npm run performance:critical-components
scripts.qa:phase-4-2: npm run bundle:report && npm run assets:report && npm run performance:optimize && npm run bundle:size-check
scripts.qa:bundle-optimization: npm run bundle:optimize && npm run performance:budget:check && npm run bundle:regression
scripts.bundle:analyze: npm run build-lib && npx rollup-plugin-visualizer --template treemap --filename bundle-analysis.html && node scripts/bundle-optimizer.js
scripts.bundle:report: npm run build-lib && npm run bundle:optimize && npm run bundle:stats
scripts.bundle:visualize: npm run build-lib && npx rollup-plugin-visualizer --template treemap --open --filename dist/bundle-analysis.html
scripts.bundle:regression: npm run bundle:optimize && node -e "const opt = require('./test-results/performance/bundle-optimization-report.json'); process.exit(opt.regressions && opt.regressions.length > 0 ? 1 : 0);"
scripts.assets:report: npm run build-lib && npm run assets:optimize
scripts.browser:report: npm run browser:validate && npm run browser:cross-browser && npm run browser:swiss-compliance
scripts.ci:phase-4-2: npm run qa:phase-4-2 && npm run optimization:report
scripts.dev:analyze: npm run dev-lib && npm run bundle:analyze
scripts.prod:optimize: npm run build-lib && npm run optimization:full
scripts.phase-4-2:validate: npm run qa:phase-4-2 && npm run optimization:report
scripts.phase-4-2:analyze: npm run bundle:optimize && npm run assets:optimize
scripts.phase-4-2:report:
npm run phase-4-2:analyze && echo '
✅ Phase 4.2: Bundle Analysis and Optimization completed!'
